2_17ac9ybVj5CtUpBvi5NeP1EwNZjfJoZWvt.body:
zeromail would work for that, unless you want voice.
Other than that I think wire is your best bet, but that's not P2P.

you could also just host IRC yourself and enforce encryption if you're capable of setting that up yourself (you might need to write code for that to work)
